page.title: 02One Day Of Mhairis Life
page.content: Today it is Saturday I am glad because I am off school.I got dressed.I went into Aberdeen with my Mum to get a Fathers Day present.I went to get some breakfast in a cafe.My Mum went to get food for our guests coming.I went to get my Fathers Day present while my Mum went shopping. I went and got my hair washed for the Sunday School trip at Haddo House.I had soup for my lunch.I went in the car to Wendy's house.Wendy and I did handstands and played football.There was races but we didn't win.Wendy is my best friend. Wendy bought her Dad a Fathers Day present.We had tea there,then went home. When I got home our guests had arrived.I put the camp bed in my sisters room. We talked and giggled and in the end went to sleep. It had been an enjoyable day.
